name: Red Pepper Flakes Infused Chili
ingredients: 1 can (14 ounces) of kidney beans, drained and rinsed
instructions: 1. In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
2. Add the diced onion, bell pepper, and minced garlic to the pot. Sauté until the vegetables are softened.
3. Add the red pepper flakes, ground cumin, and paprika to the pot. Stir well to combine.
4. Pour in the vegetable broth and diced tomatoes. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low.
5. Add the drained and rinsed kidney beans to the pot. Stir everything together and let the chili simmer for about 20 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
6. Taste the chili and season with salt and pepper according to your preference.
7. Serve the Red Pepper Flakes Infused Chili hot, and optionally garnish with sour cream, shredded cheese, and chopped cilantro.
description: Red Pepper Flakes Infused Chili is a delicious and flavorful vegetarian chili that gets its spiciness from the infusion of red pepper flakes. Packed with kidney beans, diced tomatoes, and a variety of vegetables, this chili is a hearty and satisfying meal.
